si.api.utils

Class BufferData

  • java.lang.Object
    • si.api.utils.BufferData
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BufferDataV2

    public class BufferData
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by dd.fernandes on 01/10/2014. This class should be used as the default template for the First Work SI_2014_2015

    Main Goal: Keep all the necessary information from the hardware in memory, so that the hardware is used the less times possible. Sec Goal: Keep extra information to help all the other SCSI modules.
